Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 02 Apr 2019You don't. Focus on earning more money first and learning more about what kind of investing you want to do.You can also practice buying and selling using dummy accounts as well. :)Come back and dip your feet when you have 5-10k after setting aside your emergency expense.0 comments1
